main event: A UFO was observed multiple times over a period of five years, with a notable sighting on September 13, 1962, where a circular, bright white object was seen hovering for about 10 to 15 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was reported to travel at speeds of thousands of kilometers per hour and would sometimes reappear in different parts of the sky., The object was approximately 50 to 75 feet in diameter and hovered at an altitude of around 2,000 to 3,000 feet., Witnesses described a glowing reddish-orange tail and complete silence during the observation., The object changed brightness suddenly, becoming painfully bright on several occasions before dimming again., The observation on December 3, 1962, included at least 3 confirmed witnesses and appeared to be a reliable report.
sighted object: a circular bright white UFO and a slightly glowing object similar in size to a small jet
witness description: independent witnesses, including at least one other observer in a different location
